clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Of The Nano Lv Lead System In Chronic Situation (LENEA)
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation Of The Nano Lv Lead System In Chronic Situation

brief_summary.textblock: The LENEA study is an international, prospective, open label, non-randomized multicenter clinical research study designed to assess the safety and effectiveness of the NANO LV lead system.

primary_outcome.measure: Freedom from left ventricular lead related complications through 1 month

intervention.intervention_name: implantation of the new LV lead: NANO system.
